sentences.sentence: Observation of partial decalcified sections with hematoxylin and eosin staining.
sentences.translation: 部分脱钙切片苏木精-伊红染色观察结果。

sentences.sentence: Pulmonary histopathologic change was observed by hematoxylin and eosin(HE) staining.
sentences.translation: HE染色观察肺组织的病理形态学变化；

sentences.sentence: Methods Hematoxylin Eosin(HE) staining and immunohistochemical ABC method were used.
sentences.translation: 方法苏木精伊红（HE）染色和免疫组织化学ABC法。
